---
title: CSS文字上光条滚动
description: 
date: 2025-10-25 12:46:09 +0800
categories: []
tags: [css,html,源码]
pin: false
math: false
mermaid: false
---
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<title>文档标题</title>
</head>
  <style>
img{
  position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(35deg);
    transform: rotate(35deg);
     -webkit-animation: sweeps 1.8s linear infinite; 
     animation: sweeps 1.8s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes sweeps
{
from {left:0px;}
to {left:200px;}
}

@-webkit-keyframes sweeps /*Safari and Chrome*/
{
from {left:0px;}
to {left:200px;}
}
</style>
<body>
	<p>我的第一个段落</p>
  <img class="god-line" src="data:image/png;base64," alt="">
</body>
</html>


```
